statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo ''); dir_name=$(basename "$current_dir"); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf "\033[2m%s (%s) [%s]\033[0m" "$dir_name" "$git_branch" "$model"; else printf "\033[2m%s [%s]\033[0m" "$dir_name" "$model"; fi
